Title: Dead Cat Bounce
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Wes Jones, Alice O'Neill (staff writer)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Axe spars with a rival hedge fund manager; Chuck deploys a team to find a high-profile case; Wendy is questioned.
